2024-04-23 Quantitative HIA masterclass

On the 23rd April 2024 The Curtin WHO Collaborating Centre, WHOCC for Climate Change and Health Impact Assessment (HIA) hosted a Methods Masterclass on Quantitative Health Impact Assessment using air pollution as a case study.
